org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.lanterna

Class LanternaUIThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.threading.AbstractUIThreadManager
      • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.lanterna.LanternaUIThreadManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadingHandler, UIThreadManager

    public class LanternaUIThreadManager
extends AbstractUIThreadManager
    Executes code honoring Lanterna's threading model.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
